title: Slow slow slow
body: So like recently, I had been getting in games, but whenever we get in loading screen before game starts, it takes me like 5 minutes to get in the screen and then another 5 mins to get in the game. I dont know whats going on which I never had this problem but it just came unexpected, I have 10 leaverbusters because of 3 games i tried to get in but remake. Help !!

replies.body: Yikes, it definitely shouldn't be taking 5 minutes to get through the loading screen. You might see a pretty good improvement if you switch to a hardwired connection instead of wifi, but let's also check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is set up correctly there.
